Quote: "Nothing is more powerful than an idea whose time has come."
"Why does it so often take a genius to see the obvious."
"The really great people are the ones who know how to make the little people feel great."
"The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success."
"Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas."
"The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world are the ones who do."
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do."
"You can have anything you want. IF YOU DRESS FOR IT."
"Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication."
"Whatever you do, do it well."
"To live will be an awfully big adventure."
"A happy soul is the best shield for a cruel world."
"When words fail, music speaks."
"He who is brave is free."
"Wealth is the slave of a wise man and the master of a fool."
"The greatest remedy for anger is delay."
"It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them."
"All the good are friends of one another."
"The fastest road to meaning and success: choose one thing and go all-in."
"Stay hungry, stay foolish."
"The secret of success is constancy of purpose."
"Worry is a misuse of the imagination."
"Diligence is the mother of good fortune."
"A bit of madness is key."
"A kind word is never wasted."
"Don’t let anyone become a vacuum and suck the happiness out of you."
"Genius can be recognized by its childish simplicity."
"The course of true love never did run smooth."
"Expectation is the root of all heartache."
"Brevity is the soul of wit."
"God placed the best things in life on the other side of terror."
"The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."
"Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn."
"Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game."
"Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up."
"Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated."
"Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it."
"The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing."
"Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm."
"Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great."
"I would rather die of passion than of boredom."
"This is the real secret of life ― to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now. And instead of calling it work, realize it is play."
"Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go."
"Everybody knows if you are too careful you are so occupied in being careful that you are sure to stumble over something."
"The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience."
"Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone."
"Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope."
"The fate of love is that it always seems too little or too much."
"When I saw you I fell in love. And you smiled because you knew."
"I want the future to look like the future."
"Strong people don’t put others down. They lift them up."
"Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time."
"Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?"
"What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies."
"I would rather walk with a friend in the dark than alone in the light."
"Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere."
"Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened."
"Knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no hold on the mind."
"Necessity is the mother of invention."
"Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher."
"Success is your duty, obligation and responsibility."
"Comparison is the thief of joy."
"Don't suffer imagined troubles."
"True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upn the future."
"To bear trials with a calm mind robs misfortune of its strength and burden."
"It is not that we have little time, but more that we waste a good deal of it."
"How far that little candle throws his beams, so shines a good deed in a weary world."
"Passion is energy.Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you."
"Just one positive thought in the morning can change your whole day."
"Quiet people have the loudest minds."
"Mankind's greatest achievments have come about by talking, and it's greatest failures by not talking."
"It is very important for young people to keep their sense of wonder and keep asking why."
"You must never be fearful about what you are doing when it is right."
"One person can change the world."
"In a gentle way, you can shake the world."
"In doing something, do it with love or never do it at all."
"The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others."
"The time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining."
"You can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed."
"Failure cannot cope with persistence."
"Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication."
"You do not enter the future. You create the future."
"Extravagance is its own destroyer."
"The human mind will not be confined to any limits."
"It is the rare broom salesman who mentions the vacuum."
"When there is no enemy within, the enemy outside can do us no harm."
"How you do anything is how you do everything."
"Magic will find those with pure hearts, even when all seems lost."
"You make the commitment, and nature will respond to that commitment by removing impossible obstacles."
"We must all face the choice between what is right and what is easy."
"Teamwork is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results."
"Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men."
"Change your thoughts and you change your world."
"Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts."
"I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse."
"The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me."
"So many things are possible, just as long as you don’t know they’re impossible."
Quoter: Norton Juster, book: The Phantom Tollbooth

Quote: "When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you achieve it."
"So many things are possible, just as long as you don’t know they’re impossible."
"Be fearless in the pursuit of what sets your soul on fire."
"Impossible is a word found only in the dictionary of fools."
"There is often less danger in the things we fear than in the things we desire."
"Everything I've ever done that's valuable is something I was afraid to try."
"Patience is the strength of the weak. Impatience is the weakness of the strong."
"If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it."
"Success is having what you want. Happiness is wanting what you have."
"Be careful how you think; your life is shaped by your thoughts."
"A fool admires complexity, a genius admires simplicity."
"If you can't fly, run. If you can't run, walk. If you can't walk, crawl, but by all means keep moving."
"The fears you don't face become your limits."
"If a man knows not to which port he sails, no wind is favorable."
"If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants."
"You can never really go wrong if you take nature as an example."
"If your dreams don't scare you, they are too small."
"There are five levels of intellect: smart, intelligent, brilliant, genius and simple."
"When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive – to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love."
"Man’s mind stretched to a new idea never goes back to its original dimensions."
"The only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks."
"Whenever a thing is done for the first time, it releases a little demon."
"Genius disdains a beaten path. It seeks regions hitherto unexplored."
"Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results."
"The secret of happiness is something to do."
"Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love."
"Who, being loved, is poor?."
"The truth is rarely pure and never simple."
"Things do not happen. Things are made to happen."
"In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can."
"The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination."
"It is a miracle that curiosity survives formal education."
"The high destiny of the individual is to serve rather than to rule."
"No problem can withstand the assault of sustained thinking."
"Let us read and let us dance - two amusements that will never do any harm to the world."
"Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom."
"Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy."
"Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable."
"Love takes up where knowledgeleaves off ."
"The way to know life is to love many things."
"No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved."
"Learning too soon our limitations, we never learn our powers."
"A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person."
"Every society honors its live conformists and its dead troublemakers."
"Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding."
"Replacefear with curiosity."
"How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself ."
"It's hard to beat a person who never gives up."
"Impossible is for the unwilling."
"A positive mind finds opportunity in everything."
"Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all."
"The final forming of a person's character lies in their own hands."
"A person needs a little madness, or else they never dare cut the rope and be free."
"What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?."
"Don't wait. The time will never be just right."
"Bad ideas can easily hide in complexity, but they can't hide in simplicity."
"It is said that fools rush to judge, while the wise watch and wait."
"The only real failure is the failure to try."
"Every incremental dollar that is gross margin, Google or Facebook will just extract, because it's a perfect marketplace, and that's just the world we live in right now."
"I think Meta is probably really dropping the ball on how they're thinking about creators... that's sort of the regime we live in."
